revised_title: The Ciliated Groove (Siphonoglyphe) in the Stomodaeum of Alcyonarians
tldr: The author investigates the ciliated groove (siphonoglyphe) in the stomodaeum of alcyonarians and discovers its role in bringing particles of food and fresh water into the colony's canal system. The siphonoglyphe is absent in some alcyonarians with solid axes and is absent in autozooids of dimorphic alcyonarians.
